mapper.select: select 客流, 人头, 实操数, 项目数, ifnull(convert(actualmoney / 客流,decimal(10,2)), 0) as 客人单价, cash 现金 from (select 1 id, count(customer) as 客流, count(distinct customer) as 人头, count(distinct projectname) 项目数 from settlementnew where DATE_FORMAT(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and shopid=#{shopid}) a left join( select 1 id, count(customer) 实操数, IFNULL(sum(money), 0) actualmoney from settlementnew where DATE_FORMAT(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and shopid=#{shopid} and category in ('美容', '美体', '仪器')) b on a.id = b.id left join( select 1 id, ifnull(sum(money), 0) cash from settlementnew where DATE_FORMAT(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and shopid=#{shopid} and consumptioncategory in ('现金产品', '现金卡', '现金实操')) c on b.id = c.id
